trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_COMMITTEE05231_000_001<tab>Oh, you're back. Our guests can't seem to get enough of this kinderpunsch─I'm near rushed off my feet. You wouldn't fancy giving me a hand, would you?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_COMMITTEE05231_000_002<tab>We had a lady stop by earlier who insisted we take a whole bunch of strange ingredients, saying something about the spirit of culinary adventure? Still, some people seem to enjoy adding them to the punch as an unusual twist.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_COMMITTEE05231_000_003<tab>If you want to throw a little something extra in when you serve up a mug, I certainly won't say anything. I'll just be happy for the break!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Start serving punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_SYSTEM_000_00<tab>You bring the pans to a gentle simmer.The enticing scent of mulled punch draws someone over to the stall!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q1_000_000<tab>Who could it be?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_001<tab>Carline Canopy owner.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_002<tab>Drowned Wench proprietor.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_003<tab>Quicksand proprietress.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_004<tab>A single Seedseer.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_005<tab>Lord commander of the Temple Knights.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_006<tab>East Aldenard Trading Company representative.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_007<tab>Satrap from the Near East and diminutive dragon.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_008<tab>World explorer in search of the unknown.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_010<tab>Something smells quite intriguing over here! I already sampled the new flavors of punch earlier, so… Could I have a mug of Gridanian kinderpunsch? Let's see how yours compares to the Carline Canopy house blend!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A2_000_001<tab>Standard Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A2_000_002<tab>Gridanian punch with chanterelle mushroom.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_012<tab>That's a fine blend. Thank you─you've been such a help.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_013<tab>The Starlight Stalls are getting quite the reputation, and we've attracted a lot of visitors from outside of Gridania this Starlight.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_014<tab>And when I look around, all I see are smiling faces─Gridanians, visitors, children, grown ups…Which, of course, is great news for us stallholders.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_015<tab>This is…grated chanterelle? Interesting. These mushrooms have a rich, distinctive aroma that makes them highly valued in cuisine or as medicine─but it's quite surprising to come across in a sweet drink.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_016<tab>Though the flavor certainly requires a mature palate, it gives a certain depth. Yes, I'd say it works.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_017<tab>Right, I'd best be heading back.Feel free to stop by any time, okay? You're always welcome at the Canopy.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_020<tab>Well, if it ain't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Take no mind o' ol' Baderon 'ere─jus' stoppin' by fer a look at these Limsa mugs I've been 'earing so much about. Don't s'pose I could trouble ye for a mugful?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A3_000_001<tab>Standard Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A3_000_002<tab>Sweet-toothed Lominsan chocolate punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_022<tab>Aye, the sour citrus an' the sting o' the spice makes fer a right fine tipple.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_023<tab>Fer most Lominsans, the cold in Gridania this time o' year is more bitin' than bracin'─but a nice warm drink makes all the difference. This should keep me goin' as I look round the other stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_024<tab>Bugger me, that's sweeter than a siren's kiss in a sea storm! Chocolate…an' an 'ole sack o' sugar too, by my reckonin'.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_025<tab>Still, there's folk what prefer a more…unusual tipple. An' ye'd be surprised at 'ow many seadogs 'ave a sweet tooth, what with sugar bein' so important for preservin' food on long voyages. Aye, ye might be onto somethin' 'ere.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_026<tab>Right, I'd best be gettin' on. I thank ye fer the 'ospitality─next time ye find yerself in Limsa, stop by the Wench and I'll gladly return the gesture.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_030<tab>Miounne invited me up to Gridania for Starlight─so I had to stop by and see your face, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Couldn't trouble you for a mug of Ul'dahn mulled punch, could I?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A4_000_001<tab>Standard Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A4_000_002<tab>Ul'dahn punch with nopal pulp.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_032<tab>Now that hits the spot! Such a full-bodied flavor—I can tell you didn't skimp on the butter.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_033<tab>You've got a surefire hit on your hands here. All it needs is a good plate of crumpets on the side, and people in Ul'dah would come flocking. How would you feel about brewing a pot or two in the Quicksand kitchen for me some time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_034<tab>Hehe, I'm just pullin' your leg! Mayhap it's what comes from havin' spent so long as the one servin' the tea—you can take the girl out of the Quicksand, but you can't take the Quicksand out of the girl!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_035<tab>Oh, you've outdone yourself! This is cactus, unless I'm mistaken? Though I believe it's more often called “nopal” when used as an ingredient.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_036<tab>Plenty of folk enjoy roasted nopal in savory dishes, but I wouldn't have expected it to work so well in somethin' sweet. Might be a good addition to the Quicksand's menu!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_037<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll be headin' off now, but don't be a stranger—stop by the Quicksand now and then, you hear?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>Mulled punch for the festivalgoers? What a delightful idea!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_041<tab>As always, my dearest sister, Kan-E, has taken far too much upon herself—and so, I insisted that she allow me to take charge of the Seedseer visit to the festivities here at the Starlight Stalls. Might you be kind enough to furnish me with a mug of Gridanian mulled punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A5_000_001<tab>Standard Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A5_000_002<tab>“Moogle-pom surprise” Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_043<tab>How fragrant and delicate! I daresay none shall take umbrage at it bearing Gridania's name, whether they be guest or lifelong resident.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_044<tab>Might I trouble you for another two mugfuls, for my dear brother and sister?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_045<tab>You have my thanks. My floating, furry companions and I will see this punch delivered ere it grows cold—I leave matters here in your eminently capable hands!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_046<tab>Did you say…<var 1A 02 /var>moogle pom<var 1A 01 /var>?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_047<tab>…by the Twelve, you gave me a fright! It's just a sweet confection made to <var 1A 02 /var>resemble<var 1A 01 /var> a pom, you say? For the sake of my two trembling companions, I'd best make certain!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_048<tab>Well, it's a relief to find it perfectly pleasant—delicious, really—and that no moogles were harmed in the process. Just…try not to traumatize too many children, won't you?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_050<tab>What a pleasant surprise to find you here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. 'Tis a great joy to spread cheer to the children during Starlight season—though, I must confess, this little helper finds himself in need of refreshment. Might I ask for a mug of the local Gridanian punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A6_000_001<tab>Standard Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A6_000_002<tab>Gridanian punch with a generous dash of birch syrup.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_052<tab>Ahh, how exquisitely the rich cinnamon balances the saccharinity. 'Tis a moment of sweet respite in a mug.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_053<tab>Full glad am I to see the spirit and warmth of the Starlight Celebration thus spread throughout Eorzea. While I take pride that the tradition originates from our fair nation of Ishgard, I am indebted to the celebrants for their diligent work in seeing it upheld.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_054<tab>This aroma…! The mulled punch may be quintessentially Gridanian, but I detect the unmistakable influence of Ishargardian flavors. An intriguing concept—and most appropriate, given that Ishgard is the birthplace of Starlight.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_055<tab>…Simply exquisite. <sigh> Forgive me—such a generous helping of birch syrup is an indulgence I allow myself only on special occasions, and today I find it all the sweeter.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_056<tab>A drink shared with a friend is a fine gift indeed. Now, I must return to my duties—there are many children yet awaiting their own Starlight gift, and 'twould not do to keep them overlong!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_060<tab>Well, well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Having concluded some discussions with valued business partners in the vicinity, I thought to drop by the festivities—but what an unexpected surprise and delight to find your esteemed personage manning a punch stand.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_061<tab>Needless to say, it would be most remiss of me to turn down such a kind gesture—and to leave without sampling the local wares. Would you be so kind as to procure me a mug of your Ul'dahn mulled punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A7_000_001<tab>Standard Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A7_000_002<tab>“Namazu whisker delight” Ul'dahn punch.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_063<tab>That the taste of Ul'dah should elicit such distant nostalgia! I have spent many years steeped in Hingashi's unique and inimitable “omotenashi”—roughly translated, the word refers to the deep-seated culture of wholeheartedly caring for and serving one's guests, though I fear the common tongue too impoverished to encapsulate the nuance correctly. And yet, there does indeed remain a certain warmth and charm to the hospitality of one's homeland…

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_064<tab>And I cannot help but note the selection of three different flavors, no doubt to encourage repeat purchases. Allow me to express my admiration for the business acumen of the stall operator!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_065<tab>Indeed, I must say the entire enterprise is quite inspired. A market held only during the Starlight season, and offering children the opportunity to encounter myriad peoples and cultures—as a representative of the East Aldenard Trading Company, I shall be watching future developments with great interest.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_066<tab>I beg your pardon, did you say…namazu whisker? Come now, surely you jest—I presume it to be some novelty, say, a strand of spice carefully arrayed to appear as though an errant whisker, floating upon the punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_067<tab>Hm… Certainly a…distinctive…hmm.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_068<tab>Ahem! Merchants must view innovation as opportunity—and one certainly cannot deny the value of an entirely…<var 1A 02 /var>unique<var 1A 01 /var> experience.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_069<tab>Now, if you will excuse me, I shall continue to peruse the stalls and their wares. I find myself quite invigorated after the warming drink!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_070<tab>What fortune to run into you here, my friend. I heard tell of the festivities when attending to some matters beyond Radz-at-Han, and thought to take a brief detour around the stalls.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_071<tab>A familiar aroma drew me over, and it would be most improper to depart empty-handed in the face of such hospitality. May I trouble you for a mug of mulled punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q8_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A8_000_001<tab>Standard Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A8_000_002<tab>Extra hot 'n' spicy Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_073<tab>I see… These spices are from Radz-at-Han. It brings me great joy to know that the produce of our humble nation is thus embraced by other cultures.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_074<tab>Though I may be foreign to this land, I recognise well the smiling faces around me. The joy people find in festivals is the same, wheresoever they call home.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_075<tab>Perhaps there is a way in which we might incorporate some aspects of Eorzean culture into our festivals in Radz-at-Han one day. Ever am I keen to embrace the ways of others—especially should it serve as a boon to my people.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_076<tab>This is quite a spice-laden punch you have prepared, my friend. Yes, to the extent that even this vessel may appreciate the flavor.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_077<tab>…Would it have been to Zero's liking, I wonder? Her special curry has quite the reputation, following her visit to Mehryde's Meyhane. I hear they still make a batch every now and then—which always results in a lively evening.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_078<tab>Yet I imagine the children of this land have not the same tolerance for spice as those in Radz-at-Han, though they seem to boast the same curiosity. Pray take care, lest it prove too much for them!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_080<tab>…How is it that I always end up running into you—serving punch at a festival, of all places? I only stopped by since an urgent request brought me to the area. Well, since I'm here, I suppose a drink wouldn't hurt… One Ul'dahn mulled punch, please.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q9_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A9_000_001<tab>Standard Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A9_000_002<tab>Ul'dahn punch with sabotender garnish.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_082<tab>Not bad. While the native flora in Thanalan bears many similarities to that of Yyasulani, the cuisine has evolved along quite disparate lines in each region.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_083<tab>When my work as a gleaner took me around the world, it was rare that I could spare the time for a proper sit-down meal. Perhaps my future travels will allow me to enjoy the flavors of my destinations, not only the sights and sounds.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_084<tab>My thanks for the drink. I think I'll look around the rest of the Starlight Stalls, before taking a leisurely stroll through the Black Shroud. There is much to explore!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_085<tab>…Tell me this isn't what I think it is.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_086<tab>You put a <var 1A 02 /var>sabotender<var 1A 01 /var>…?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_087<tab>Not you, too…I will concede, they are not entirely inedible, but I…question their suitability as an accompaniment to a sweet drink.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_088<tab><sigh> My thanks for the drink. Traveling the world opens your eyes to all kinds of things—and people.
